Generation VIII.Sword: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.
Generation VIII.Shield: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it's raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Once its body has heated up, Scorbunny can use the full extent of its power. That’s why it does warm-up exercises.
Generation IX.Violet: Fire energy gathers in the pads of its feet, raising their temperature. Once hot, Scorbunny’s footpads can deal heavy damage to opponents.

Generation VIII.Sword: First partner Pokémon from Leon in Postwick
Generation VIII.Shield: First partner Pokémon from Leon in Postwick

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Chargestone Cavern , Polar Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Polar Biome)
